argument.description: An expression that specifies the string that is the object of the search.
An expression that specifies the string that is the object of the search.
An expression that specifies the string that is the object of the search.
An expression that specifies the position within source-string at which the search is to start.

description: The LOCATE function returns the starting position of the first occurrence of one string (called the search-string) within another string (called the source-string).
sample:
POSITION(search-string,
     SUBSTRING(source-string, start, string-unit),
     string-unit) + start - 1
